title: Property Questionnaire
description: Answer these questions to determine which documents are required for this listing.

questions.label: Was the property built before 1978?
questions.help_text: Lead-based paint disclosure is required for properties built before 1978.

questions.label: Is the property subject to an owner's association?
questions.help_text: This includes HOAs, POAs, and any mandatory membership associations.

questions.label: Is the property located in any special districts (MUD, PID, etc.)?
questions.help_text: Municipal Utility Districts, Public Improvement Districts, or similar.

questions.label: Is the property in a Flood Hazard Area?
questions.help_text: Check FEMA flood maps if unsure.

questions.label: Will another party get a referral fee from you for this transaction?
questions.help_text: If you're paying a referral fee to another agent or broker.

questions.label: Does your seller have a copy of their survey?
questions.help_text: A T-47.1 affidavit may be required if no survey is available.
